channel.title: Veeam on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in Veeam on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: Easily Upgrade Veeam Backup and Replication from 12.0 to 12.1
item.description: Veeam Backup and Replication has released version 12.1 with exciting new features and enhancements, especially in the cyber security realm.

item.title: Secure Your AWS Environments with Terraform, Vault, and Veeam
item.description: I’m thrilled to present the first post in my blog series focused on optimizing cloud infrastructure management, data security, and backup automation in your AWS environment.

item.title: A Technical Deep Dive into Veeam Backup for AWS
item.description: Introduction Veeam Backup for AWS introduces advanced backup protection for Amazon Web Services (AWS) environments.

item.title: My VeeamON 2023 Experience
item.description: Reflections on My First VeeamON Attending my first VeeamON was an exhilarating experience that exceeded all my expectations.
